title: Smart Data Models - Tool Information
description: A data model for a generic tool within a dataspace tool catalog. It includes general information, DSSC blueprint details, market readiness, and application domain.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be ToolInformation.

title.description: Property. The name of the tool/implementation. Corresponds to dc:title.

description.description: Property. A brief overview of the primary focus and key features of the implementation. Corresponds to dc:description.

url.description: Property. A URL to a webpage with more information about the tool. Corresponds to foaf:homepage or schema:url.

hasVersion.description: Property. The versions of the implementation. Values must adhere to SemVer 2.0. Corresponds to dc:hasVersion.

maintainer.description: Property. The organization that maintains the implementation. Corresponds to schema:maintainer.

url.description: Property. URL of the organization's website.

logo.description: Property. URL of the organization's logo. Corresponds to schema:logo.

dataspaceProductPurpose.description: Property. Description of how the implementation contributes to DSSC's objectives. Corresponds to tcat:dataspaceProductPurpose.

documentation.description: Property. Direct links to relevant documents (product page, software repository, API spec, etc.). Corresponds to schema:documentation.

image.description: Property. Relevant pictures or screenshots of the toolâ€™s user interface. Corresponds to schema:image.

license.description: Property. Links to the license details for accessing and using the tool. Corresponds to schema:license.

licenseDeclared.description: Property. The machine-searchable license type. Value must adhere to SPDX license list (https://spdx.org/licenses/). Corresponds to spdx.org:licenseDeclared.

keywords.description: Property. Keywords that categorize the tool, preferably from a controlled vocabulary. Corresponds to schema:keywords.

dataspaceServiceCategory.description: Property. The category of the data space service. Corresponds to tcat:dataspaceServiceCategory.

dataspaceService.description: Property. The specific data space service(s) this tool implements. Corresponds to tcat:dataspaceService.

dataspaceBuildingBlock.description: Property. The data space building block(s) this tool is related to. Corresponds to tcat:dataspaceBuildingBlock.

additionalBuildingBlock.description: Property. Additional building blocks functions offered by this tool. Corresponds to tcat:additionalBuildingBlock.

additionalBuildingBlockDescription.description: Property. Textual description of additional functionalities. Corresponds to tcat:additionalBuildingBlockDescription.

technologyReadinessLevel.description: Property. The Technology Readiness Level (TRL) of the tool. Corresponds to tcat:technologyReadiness.

trlJustification.description: Property. Justification for the declared TRL. Corresponds to tcat:technologyReadinessDescription.

deploymentsInOperation.description: Property. Overview or links to usage/deployments of the tool in operations. Corresponds to tcat:existingDeployments.

businessOfferings.description: Property. Description of business offerings like managed services, SaaS, or support. Corresponds to tcat:businessOfferings.

dependencies.description: Property. Dependencies or prerequisites on other tools or components.

similarTools.description: Property. A list of similar or competing tools.

supportingAttachments.description: Property. Additional attachments or links for more information.

functionalApplicationArea.description: Property. The applications for which the tool is intended.

domain.description: Property. The domain(s), sector(s), or industry/ies for which the tool is relevant.

geographicalApplicationArea.description: Property. The geographical region for which the tool is intended (e.g., global, Europe).
